signupPage.title: Registration Bureau
signupPage.preamble: Agents wishing to take part in operations are requested to fill out the form below. Discretion is paramount.

profilePage.title: Agent File
profilePage.commanderAccessMessage: Command access active. You have maximum clearance.

logoutPage.title: Leave Request
logoutPage.preamble: Agent, your leave request has been filed. Please confirm your departure from your post. Your access will be suspended until your return.
logoutPage.footer: Discretion is required, even on leave.

connectionsPage.title: Alliance Network
connectionsPage.subtitle: Visualization of the AI agent network status. Active connections and data flows between nations are displayed here.

settingsPage.mainSubtitle: Configure your account and application settings here.
